name: SGI Europe Buddhist Association
legal: registered association at district court Darmstadt registration number: VR 83170
membership: SGI Europe Buddhist Association e.V. is a member of Soka Gakkai International, domiciled in Tokyo, Japan
goal: We are the European branch of the Soka Gakkai International (SGI) a lay Buddhist movement linking together approximately 150,000 members across Europe.
interests: Culture, Development, Education, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: We are active in the fields of peace-building through culture and education based on the humanistic principles of Nichiren Buddhism as practised within the SGI movement
